statements: SELECT * FROM neighborhood_population ORDER BY total_population DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, total_population FROM neighborhood_population WHERE median_age > 40;
SELECT neighborhood_name, average_income FROM neighborhood_population ORDER BY average_income ASC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, dominant_ethnicity FROM neighborhood_population WHERE dominant_ethnicity LIKE 'Asian%';
SELECT neighborhood_name, median_age, average_income FROM neighborhood_population WHERE total_population > 50000 ORDER BY median_age DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, total_population FROM neighborhood_population ORDER BY total_population DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM neighborhood_population WHERE median_age > 30 AND average_income > 50000 ORDER BY total_population ASC
SELECT neighborhood_name, dominant_ethnicity FROM neighborhood_population WHERE average_income < 40000
SELECT neighborhood_name, median_age, average_income FROM neighborhood_population WHERE total_population > 50000 ORDER BY median_age DESC, average_income ASC
SELECT * FROM neighborhood_population WHERE total_population < 20000 AND dominant_ethnicity = 'Hispanic'
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population FROM neighborhoods WHERE neighborhood_id = 1;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population FROM neighborhoods WHERE population > 10000;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population FROM neighborhoods ORDER BY neighborhood_name ASC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, median_income FROM neighborhoods JOIN demographics ON neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = demographics.neighborhood_id;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population FROM neighborhoods WHERE population > 10000 ORDER BY neighborhood_name ASC
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE median_income BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY demographics_id DESC

SELECT neighborhood_name, household_count, median_income FROM neighborhoods INNER JOIN demographics ON neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = demographics.neighborhood_id WHERE population < 20000 ORDER BY median_income ASC

SELECT neighborhood_name, household_count, median_income FROM neighborhoods LEFT JOIN demographics ON neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = demographics.neighborhood_id WHERE household_count > 1000 ORDER BY neighborhood_name DESC
SELECT demographics_id, median_income FROM demographics WHERE median_income IS NOT NULL ORDER BY demographics_id ASC
SELECT * FROM neighborhood;
SELECT name, population FROM neighborhood WHERE population > 10000;
SELECT id, name FROM neighborhood ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT n.name, d.total_population, d.median_age FROM neighborhood n JOIN demographics d ON n.id = d.neighborhood_id;
SELECT n.name, l.latitude, l.longitude FROM neighborhood n JOIN location l ON n.id = l.neighborhood_id WHERE l.latitude < 40.75;
SELECT name, population FROM neighborhood WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE avg_household_income > 50000 ORDER BY median_age DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT n.*, d.median_age, l.latitude FROM neighborhood n JOIN demographics d ON n.id = d.neighborhood_id JOIN location l ON n.id = l.neighborhood_id WHERE d.total_population > 10000;
SELECT population, name FROM neighborhood n LEFT JOIN demographics d ON n.id = d.neighborhood_id WHERE d.total_population IS NULL;
SELECT avg_household_income, median_age FROM demographics WHERE neighborhood_id IN (SELECT id FROM neighborhood WHERE name='Downtown');
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods;
SELECT id, name, population FROM neighborhoods WHERE population > 10000;
SELECT neighborhood_id, age_group, gender, population_count FROM demographic_data WHERE age_group = 'Under 18';
SELECT * FROM amenities WHERE amenity_type = 'Park';
SELECT neighborhood_id, house_type, num_bedrooms, average_price FROM housing_data ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods WHERE population > 5000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, population FROM neighborhoods WHERE id = 3;
SELECT neighborhood_id, MAX(population_count) AS max_population FROM demographic_data GROUP BY neighborhood_id;
SELECT neighborhood_id, amenity_type, COUNT(amenity_name) AS num_amenities FROM amenities GROUP BY neighborhood_id, amenity_type ORDER BY num_amenities DESC;
SELECT * FROM housing_data WHERE house_type = 'Apartment' AND num_bedrooms > 2 ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods WHERE population > 10000;
SELECT name, average_income FROM neighborhoods WHERE average_income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM households WHERE size = 3 ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT residents.name, residents.age, households.size FROM residents JOIN households ON residents.household_id = households.id WHERE households.neighborhood_id = 1;
SELECT residents.name, employment_data.occupation FROM residents JOIN employment_data ON residents.id = employment_data.resident_id WHERE employment_status = 'employed';
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, name, population FROM neighborhoods WHERE population > 10000

SELECT residents.name, households.size, education_data.level FROM residents JOIN households ON residents.household_id = households.id JOIN education_data ON residents.id = education_data.resident_id WHERE households.size > 3

SELECT neighborhoods.name, AVG(residents.age) AS average_age, AVG(households.median_income) AS avg_income FROM neighborhoods JOIN households ON neighborhoods.id = households.neighborhood_id JOIN residents ON households.id = residents.household_id GROUP BY neighborhoods.name
SELECT employment_data.occupation, COUNT(*) AS num_residents FROM employment_data GROUP BY employment_data.occupation HAVING num_residents > 1
